entry.tran: 操纵的;控制的;善于摆布（他人）的
entry.def: If you describe someone as manipulative, you disapprove of them because they skilfully force or persuade people to act in the way that they want.

example.ex: He described Mr Long as cold, calculating and manipulative...
example.tran: 他说郎先生是个冷酷、算计，又爱摆布人的人。

example.ex: The worker was promoted despite aggressive and manipulative behaviour.
example.tran: 这个工人尽管盛气凌人，工于心计，却受到了提拔。

means.word_mean: 1. skillful in influencing or controlling others to your own advantage;
